pkgmetadata.longdescription: Relationship Matrices for Diploid and Autopolyploid Species // Computation of A (pedigree), G (genomic-base), and H (A corrected by G) relationship matrices for diploid and autopolyploid species considering additive and non-additive effects as in Amadeu et al (2016) doi:10.3835/plantgenome2016.01.0009.
